thread.title: Problems Near, Far Ram Hong Kong Stocks

author: Joanne Chiu
title: Problems Near, Far Ram Hong Kong Stocks
text: It was a good day for Hong Kong’s stock exchange—it landed the massive Xiaomi Corp. initial public offering-listing, but the rest of the city’s stocks couldn’t manage to win. Myriad factors—local and abroad—combined to conspire against Hong Kong equities Thursday as the city’s stocks continue struggling for traction following February’s low for many markets globally. Be it WSJ City: Tesla Burns Through Cash, U.S. Weighs Curbs on China Telecom Firms Next WSJ Wealth Adviser Briefing: Bitcoin, Portfolio Tweaks, Big Gulps
